text: [Ta chuangzaole] ba zhi cheng dui de shengchu: Yi dui mianyang [zhu][gong de yu mu de] he yi dui shanyang [gong de yu mu de]. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Ta [an la] jinzhi liang zhi gong de haishi liang zhi mu de? Haishi liang zhi mu de zigong zhong suo yunyu de? Nimen ping zhishi gaosu wo ba! Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
